ai_analysis.summary: No significant fraud indicators detected; document fields are consistent and authentic.
reasoning: ML ensemble assigns a 0.0% fraud risk with high confidence, aligned with clear data.
Numeric amount ($450.00) exactly matches the written amount (“FOUR HUNDRED FIFTY AND 00/100 DOLLARS”) and raw OCR text shows no spelling errors.
Issuer (MoneyGram) is valid and serial number format appears correct.
Authorized agent signature is present and legible.
Customer has no escalation history (escalate_count=0), and training patterns (45% of frauds involve amount mismatches) do not apply here.
ai_analysis.verification_notes: Confirm purchaser and payee identities match their IDs at disbursement.
actionable_recommendations: Verify Michael Lee’s government-issued ID when disbursing funds.
Confirm SARAH CHEN presents proper ID before payout.
Retain a copy of the money order and transaction record for future audit.
ai_analysis.training_insights: Training data shows high fraud correlation with amount mismatches; absence of any mismatch here supports approval.
